mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment_order ( `order_no`, `user_id`, `payment_channel`, `payment_order_id`, `payment_order_token`, `transaction_id`, `game_id`, `country`, `payment_type`, `product_id`, `product_name`, `sandbox`, `payment_amount`, `payment_count`, `xsolla_payment_amount`, `pay_amount`, `deductions`, `discount`, `calorcoin_amount`, `currency`, `order_status`, `pay_status`, `create_time`, `pay_time`, `purchaseid`, `stock_no`, `refund_status`, `refund_no`, `refund_description`, `refund_create_time`, `refund_succ_time`, `dev_user_id`, `sku`, `refund_msg`, `calorcoin_amount_commission`, `arrived_status`, `user_currency`, `user_amount`, `purchase_amount` ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{userId}, 1, '391057984', '7ru40wNo4sT1bDAtS1akk4wIKUscCjPL_lc_cn_bg_2C2640_tb_6E7BF7', '1766314921', 9968, 'US', 1, '9968_2050548e_CO', NULL, 1, 200.0000, '1', NULL, 100.0000, 82.0000, 100.0000, 0.0000, 'USD', 9, 9, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), 403, 'LVUat9sd53', 1, NULL, 'uuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuu', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), 278, NULL, 'Cancellation by the game request', 0.0000, 0, NULL, NULL, NULL );
